detectors.description:
Crowdsale.Crowdsale(uint256,uint256,uint256,address) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#315-326) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(_startTime >= 0) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#316)
Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#341-357) ignores return value by token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#353)
YobCoinCrowdsale.extraMint(uint256) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#442-445) ignores return value by token.mint(owner,_amount) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#443)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#341-357):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#353)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#354)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.buyTokens(address)](contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#L341-L357):
	External calls:
	- [token.mint(beneficiary,tokens)](contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#L353)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens)](contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#L354)

detectors.description:
Crowdsale.validPurchase() (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#366-370) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- withinPeriod = now >= startTime && now <= endTime (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#367)
	- withinPeriod && nonZeroPurchase (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#369)

detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#88-90)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#41)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#42)
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#73-81)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#51)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#151-153)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (contractSource/scsc/Hodbo_crowdsale.sol#53)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:

mint(address,uint256) should be declared external:

finishMinting() should be declared external:

fallback() should be declared external:

changeCap(uint256) should be declared external:

changeRate(uint256) should be declared external:

extraMint(uint256) should be declared external:
